pages.text: $(bold)Q. Many key binds are conflicting!!$()$(br2)$(bold)A. Don't worry. ParCool works with default key mappings.$()$(br)This conflicts are because ParCool needs to be used with few keys and have many keybindings for customization.
$(bold)Q. Is Fabric supported?$()$(br2)$(bold)A. No.$()$(br)Developer don't plan to port this to fabric now
